abstract: Off the Rails: A man claiming to be a subway conductor has earned minor celebrity status for hosting an anonymous question-and-answer session with riders.
snippet: Off the Rails: A man claiming to be a subway conductor has earned minor celebrity status for hosting an anonymous question-and-answer session with riders.
lead_paragraph: Transportation professionals are not the type you might expect to be perusing the dense, exclamation point-laced message boards on Reddit, a popular Web site where users carry on extensive conversations on a nearly infinite range of arcane topics.

headline.main: He Says He's a Conductor, Conducting a Q. and A.
